ol.li: This protocol applies to all Space employees, contractors and visitors, and all operations including manufacturing facilities, technical centers, offices & administrative buildings. All sites in all regions where mobile equipment may be used are expected to develop site specific procedures to comply with this protocol.

Requirements of this protocol will apply to the control of risks associated with operating, loading, and travelling with mobile equipment such as forklifts, boom and scissor-type manlifts, wheel/steer loaders, sweepers, rail car movers, personnel/burden carriers/tuggers. Specifically, this protocol relates to the risks associated with operating, loading, and travelling with mobile equipment.
